name: MinivAC
description:
Game created for the GPJam [GamesPlusJam 2021]

This platformer is based on Isaac Asimov's The Last Question' story. Try to be faster than the MinivAC you are competing with, and look for the answer!

Controls:

  • Move - [Arrows]
  • Jump - [SpaceBar]
  • Start - [Enter]

Credits:

This game was made by Carlos7xGames + QuantumFox.

  • Carlos7xGames [Carlos Rodríguez]:
    • Coding
    • Level Design
    • SFX
    • Unity Management
  • QuantumFox [Jorge Gracia]:
    • Game Design
    • Story Scripting 
    • Pixel Art
    • Enemies
  • Juhani Junkala [opengameart.org]:
    • OST

You can either play the game in Web Browser or download it for Windows.
